results.title: DUI & Insurance - How Long DUI Stays on Record | Progressive
results.description: Some insurers will refer customers with a DUI to Progressive, as we accept DUI drivers and only raise rates by a countrywide average* of about 13% after one DUI. Your first DUI increases your rate by 13%. The amount of time passed since the DUI as well as your age and driving history will factor in to the amount of the increase. For example, if you’ve never had any accidents and speeding tickets, and your DUI is the only hit on your record, your rate likely won’t go up as much.
